name: SpooKart
description:
Drive to survive! All of the golf balls you've hit into water traps have come back to haunt you.

Remember to escape the golf balls.
The closer you are, the more points you earn...

Be mindful of your golf cart's charge.
There's no way to recharge it...

Controls:

  • W or 🡑 - accelerate
  • S or 🡓 - brake/reverse
  • A/D or 🡐/🡒 - steer left/right
  • Shift - look back
  • Space - jump
  • Ctrl - dash
  • F - freeze
